properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 3:01AM PST until February 14 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...6 to 8 ft today and tonight building to 10 to
12 ft Friday morning.

- FIRST EBB...Around 745 AM Thursday. Seas around 9 ft.

- SECOND EBB...Strong around 8 PM Thursday. Seas around 11 ft.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight PST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT
